verbs.description: [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to shut down the federal government in September if Congress did not provide more funding to build a wall on the border with Mexico] .

[ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] on Saturday threatened to [V: shut] down [ARG1: the federal government] [ARGM-TMP: in September] [ARGM-ADV: if Congress did not provide more funding to build a wall on the border with Mexico] .
U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday threatened to shut down the federal government in September if Congress [V: did] not provide more funding to build a wall on the border with Mexico .

U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday threatened to shut down the federal government in September if [ARG0: Congress] did [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: provide] [ARG1: more funding] [ARGM-PNC: to build a wall on the border with Mexico] .

U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday threatened to shut down the federal government in September if [ARG0: Congress] did not provide more funding to [V: build] [ARG1: a wall] [ARGM-LOC: on the border with Mexico] .
